Name: SQLServerAlwaysOnWithDR
Description: Creates SQL Server 2014 AlwaysOn deployment with disaster recovery.

Parameters.Name: Region
Parameters.Description: Name of Azure region.

Parameters.Name: AffinityGroup
Parameters.Description: Name of Azure affinity group.

Parameters.Name: SecondaryDatacenterRegion
Parameters.Description: Name of secondary datacenter Azure region.

Parameters.Name: SecondaryDatacenterAffinityGroup
Parameters.Description: Name of Azure affinity group for secondary datacenter.

Parameters.Name: VnetName
Parameters.Description: Azure Virtual Network for setting up windows failover cluster.

Parameters.Name: SecondaryDatacenterVnetName
Parameters.Description: Name of Azure Virtual Network in the secondary datacenter for disaster recovery.

Parameters.Name: VnetGatewayConnectionKey
Parameters.Description: Key for configuring the gateway connection with disaster recovery Azure Virtual Network in secondary datacenter.

Parameters.Name: DiskStore
Parameters.Description: Name of Azure storage account for creating VM disks. Will be created only if it does not already exists. If it exists then it should lie in the specified affinity group.

Parameters.Name: SecondaryDatacenterDiskStore
Parameters.Description: Name of Azure storage account for creating secondary datacenter VM disks. Will be created only if it does not already exists. If it exists then it should lie in the specified secondary datacenter affinity group.

Parameters.Name: ADCloudService
Parameters.Description: Name of the Azure Cloud Service to which Active Directory VMs are to be deployed. Will be created only if it does not already exists. If it exists then it should lie in the specified affinity group.

Parameters.Name: FQDN
Parameters.Description: Fully qualified domain name for setting up active directory in the specified Azure Virtual Network.

Parameters.Name: Domain
Parameters.Description: NetBios domain name.

Parameters.Name: ADVMSize
Parameters.Description: Size of the Active Directory VMs.

Parameters.Name: DRADCloudService
Parameters.Description: Name of the secondary datacenter Azure Cloud Service to which domain controller VM will be deployed.

Parameters.Name: DRADVMSize
Parameters.Description: Size of the secondary datacenter domain controller VM.

Parameters.Name: SQLAGCloudService
Parameters.Description: Name of the Azure Cloud Service to which SQL VMs will be deployed.

Parameters.Name: SQLVMSize
Parameters.Description: Size of the SQL VMs. The minimum recommended size is 'Large'.

Parameters.Name: DRSQLAGCloudService
Parameters.Description: Name of the Azure Cloud Service to which secondary datacenter SQL VMs will be deployed.

Parameters.Name: DRSQLVMSize
Parameters.Description: Size of the secondary datacenter SQL VMs. The minimum recommended size is 'Large'.

Parameters.Name: AdminName
Parameters.Description: Name of local administrator account.

Parameters.Name: AdminPassword
Parameters.Description: Password of local administrator account.
Parameters.AllowedDescription: Please provide a complex password comprised of minimum 8 characters with atleast 1 alphabet, 1 number and 1 special character.

Parameters.Name: DSRMPassPhrase
Parameters.Description: Safemode Password for domain
Parameters.AllowedDescription: Please provide a complex password comprised of minimum 8 characters with atleast 1 alphabet, 1 number and 1 special character.

Parameters.Name: AvailabilityGroupName
Parameters.Description: Name of SQL Server Availability Group. This has to be unique in the domain(setup within the virtual network).

Parameters.Name: DatabaseName
Parameters.Description: Name of the database which is to be added to the SQL Server Availability Group.

Parameters.Name: NumberOfPrimaryDatacenterSQLNodes
Parameters.Description: No of SQL VMs in primary datacenter. A minimum of two are required.

Parameters.Name: SqlAdminPassword
Parameters.Description: Password for SQL 'sa' account.

Parameters.Name: SqlSvcAccountName
Parameters.Description: Name of SQL service account.

Parameters.Name: SqlSvcAccountPassword
Parameters.Description: Password of SQL service account.
